content: hey guys here's my glue gun and as you can see I'm running low on glue and I
can put another stick in there I use these long sticks but you know they tend
to fall out they don't pull in and they tend to fall out so yeah so that's no
fun so here's a neat way you can extend your glue sticks basically make them
endless glue sticks just put some glue on there
stick it on not too much you don't want to clog up the chamber hold it for a few
seconds and you have it one continuous glue stick
so never-ending glue stick oh there you go
